malas.name: the DISCERNING mala
malas.description: activate the inner eye (aka the third eye chakra), trust your inner knowing, refine your purpose, trust intuition

malas.name: the EARTH MAGIC mala
malas.description: the healing energies of turquoise + quartz for soul cleansing, karmic healing, courage, wisdom, and nurturing

malas.name: the I AM PROTECTED mala
malas.description: powerful and protective black onyx, grounding black lava, gold hematite brings unfulfilled wishes to light

malas.name: the I AM RELAXED mala
malas.description: calm your mind and clear the energy around you so you can relax deeply and feel more positive

malas.name: the I AM RESILIENT mala
malas.description: channel your personal power and courage w/ dragon blood jasper + copper pyrite for renewal + epidote earthy vibes

malas.name: the LAID BACK mala
malas.description: relax with smoky quartz, it helps you cope with strain and stress, sends negative energies back to their source

malas.name: the ONENESS mala
malas.description: balance crown chakra, connect to higher consciousness, remain attentive, thoughtful, and deeply feel oneness w/ universe

malas.name: the ROOT CHAKRA mala
malas.description: aids in grounding and feeling steady and secure, improve concentration with mookaite jasper + carnelian + sandalwoodn

malas.name: the SPIRITUAL WARRIOR mala
malas.description: amplify your naturally sunny vibes, let your goofy side shine, you are a resilient spiritual warrior

malas.name: the TRANSFORMATION mala
malas.description: bring balance, clarity, increase mental awareness, develop your intuition, harmonize the 7 chakras
